about_the_game:
A delicious fusion of first-person tower defence and baking sim. Bake delectable treats to launch at waves of unruly, failed desserts attacking your candy kingdom. As sweet chaos unfolds, you must strategize your craft and arm yourself with the perfect creations to defend your castle!

Join Peppermint Patches as she instructs you in baking the tastiest of ammunition from a mix of ingredients, then aim your cannon at the approaching enemy waves and batter them down! As you progress, unlock new powerful ingredients such as the explosive orange flavour or sticky caramel topping. Then, after enough waves have passed, test your skills against a unique boss enemy!

After defeating the Baker Granny in Story Mode, try Arcade Mode! A frantic, fast-paced, endless challenge where you must choose the best ingredients for a variety of enemies and survive as long as possible to earn a high score.

Play the Demo for FREE now and wishlist the full game, releasing soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or AMD Radeon R9 380
